name: Novikov Helmet
description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%
Temp. Rating: -225 / 75 °C
Confidently explore cold environments while wearing the Novikov. Caldera built the armor with an advanced sensor suite that intelligently adjusts to environmental conditions so the wearer's body temperature remains stable. Also featuring a bespoke helmet that integrates with the cutting edge life support system, those venturing across unknown terrain can count on the Novikov to help them survive the journey.
description_cn:
物品类型：重型护甲
伤害减免：40%
适用温度：适用温度：-225 / 75 °C
穿着诺维科夫护甲来自信地探索寒冷的环境吧。火山臼公司使用先进的传感器套件制造该护甲，可以智能地适应环境条件，从而使佩戴者的体温保持稳定。同样，火山臼公司具有尖端的生命支持系统和宽敞的背包，那些希望穿越未知地形的冒险者可以依靠它来度过旅途。
